name: df-2idl
body: |- wceq(c2idl, cmpt(s0, universe, cin(cfv(clidl, cv(s0)), cfv(clidl, cfv(coppr, cv(s0))))))
comment: Define the class of two-sided ideals of a ring. A two-sided ideal is a left ideal which is also a right ideal (or a left ideal over the opposite ring). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jun-2015.)
